column4: in nautilus, if i double clik an icon, it opens in seaprate window. how do i have it open i nsame window?
hold shift to close the previous window behind, or use browse mode.
how do i get to browse mode?
right click on a folder, choose browse
thanks. how do i set it as default mode?
in the file management preferences, you can set that as default
